About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Enthusiastic and motivated Web Developer with a strong foundation in front-end and back-end development. Recently graduated with a degree in Bachelor of Engineering Computer Science, I have honed my skills through various academic projects and personal initiatives.

Full Stack Developer

Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Angular for front-end development, as well as Node.js and Express for back-end development. I also have experience working with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB. My enthusiasm for web development drives me to continuously learn and stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices.

Machine Learning

Enthusiastic Machine Learning Developer with 2 year of experience in building and deploying intelligent systems. Proven ability to leverage machine learning algorithms to solve complex business problems and drive tangible results.Skilled in designing, developing, and implementing machine learning pipelines using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Experienced in data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, evaluation, and optimization.

Designer

Creative and user-centric UI/UX Designer with a passion for crafting intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. Adept at understanding user needs and translating them into seamless digital experiences. Proven ability to conduct user research, create user journeys and personas, design wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups.
